issue.subject: Hide status of search criteria
issue.description:
The status of search criteria is not taken into account on front end.
I suggest to fix its value to "published" by default and to hide it in th eback office in the list and in the form.

journals.notes: You mean, whatever the status is, the search criteria is visible in FE ?

Concerning this issue, the status "published/unpublished" is redundant with the "criteria type" set to "none".
(see attachment)

So, I agree all search criteria should be set automatically to "published" and hiden in back-office.
